backend/main.mo: Motoko backend implementing user profiles with access control and an inquiry system with create, list, and delete operations restricted to admins.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, associated files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-like file containing prewritten one-sentence summaries of all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS base defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme tokens, and default border/background styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry point providing SEO metadata, Open Graph/Twitter tags, and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app configuring TanStack Router, global layout with header/footer, theming, and admin/marketing routes.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Authentication button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states and error recovery.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal for firstâ€‘time user profile creation, collecting a name and saving it through a backend mutation.
frontend/src/components/layout/Section.t: Reusable layout wrapper providing consistent spacing and optional title/description headers around content.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying logo, navigation shortcuts, descriptive text, and a Twitter/X link with attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive site header with navigation, admin link, logo, and mobile menu toggle.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Renders the About section with title and descriptive paragraphs from COPY.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact form section that submits inquiries, handles validation, and displays success or error alerts.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with headline, subheadline, CTAs, and an illustration, supporting smooth scrolling to sections.
frontend/src/components/sections/Process: Displays a multi-step process using cards populated from COPY.process data.
frontend/src/components/sections/Service: Service listing section showing cards with descriptions and benefits from COPY.services.
frontend/src/content/copy.ts: Centralized static content for hero, services, process, about, and contact sections.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the authenticated or anonymous backend actor and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAdminInquiries.ts: Hooks for listing and deleting inquiries via the backend actor with React Query.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateInquiry.ts: Mutation hook for creating inquiries and invalidating related queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUserProfile: Hooks for fetching and saving the current user's profile using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global Tailwind layers and CSS variables for light/dark themes, applying base styling and typography settings.
frontend/src/lib/navigation.ts: Exports a constant list of navigation items for sections of the site.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and the InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/AdminInboxPage.tsx: Implements the admin inquiry inbox with authentication checks, profile setup gating, inquiry listing, and deletion actions.
frontend/src/pages/MarketingPage.tsx: Renders the main marketing page composed of hero, services, process, about, and contact sections.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and sessionStorage-backed values.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, custom colors based on CSS vars, typography, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Describes the project state, requirements, features, and metadata for the marketing website.
